reporter-output.line: STEP 1
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
STEP 2
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Enter 'Pub Schema Example' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'Pub Schema Example' to be visible in module list.
Verify the 'Pub Schema Example' check box is checked.
Enter 'RestWS Schema' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'RestWS Schema' to be visible in module list.
Verify the 'RestWS Schema' check box is checked.
Enter 'RestWS Schema UI' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'RestWS Schema UI' to be visible in module list.
Verify the 'RestWS Schema UI' check box is checked.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
STEP 3
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Web services' menu link.
Click the 'RestWS Schema mapping' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'RestWS Schema mapping dialog'.
Select '- Please select -' from 'The show's seasons' drop down list.
Select '- Please select -' from 'The season's episodes' drop down list.
Select '- Please select -' from 'The episode's season' drop down list.
Select '- Please select -' from 'The blog's show' drop down list.
Select '- Please select -' from 'The gallery's show' drop down list.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify the text 'The following resources are not mapped.' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'show:seasons' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'season:episodes' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'episode:season' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'blog:show' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'gallery:show' is present on the page.
STEP 1
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
STEP 2
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Enter 'Pub Schema Example' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'Pub Schema Example' to be visible in module list.
Verify the 'Pub Schema Example' check box is checked.
Enter 'RestWS Schema' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'RestWS Schema' to be visible in module list.
Verify the 'RestWS Schema' check box is checked.
Enter 'RestWS Schema UI' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'RestWS Schema UI' to be visible in module list.
Verify the 'RestWS Schema UI' check box is checked.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
STEP 3
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Web services' menu link.
Click the 'RestWS Schema mapping' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'RestWS Schema mapping dialog'.
Select '- Please select -' from 'The show's seasons' drop down list.
Select '- Please select -' from 'The season's episodes' drop down list.
Select '- Please select -' from 'The episode's season' drop down list.
Select '- Please select -' from 'The blog's show' drop down list.
Select '- Please select -' from 'The gallery's show' drop down list.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify the text 'The following resources are not mapped.' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'show:seasons' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'season:episodes' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'episode:season' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'blog:show' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'gallery:show' is present on the page.
